title: Liquidity trap
author: VD
content_html: You want liquidity trap? You can’t handle liquidity trap! Scroll to the bottom, and notice how the peak is at 08 2003. This, in spite of interest rate accomodation and smoke coming off the printing presses. If Greenspan and company can bob, duck and weave their way out of this one smoothly, I may have to reconsider my opinion on the inefficacy of monetary policy.
content_text:
You want liquidity trap?
You can’t handle liquidity trap
!  Scroll to the bottom, and notice how the peak is at 08 2003.  This, in spite of interest rate accomodation and smoke coming off the printing presses.  If Greenspan and company can bob, duck and weave their way out of this one smoothly, I may have to reconsider my opinion on the inefficacy of monetary policy.
